title: Let’s Try Skateboarding!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Nozomi-senpai, look, look! What do you think of this different kind of energetic cuteness Kasumin has while skateboarding?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hehe, I can’t take my eyes off you~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I knew it! Shizuko also said she wanted to see Kasumin like this, so I’m glad I came~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>But Kasumin, you haven’t even gotten on the skateboard yet...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I-I’ll do that soon! After some warm-up exercises......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, yeah, warming up is important! You need to make your body flexible so you can fall properly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fall properly!?!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Just in case! It’s a just-in-case kind of thing, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Just in case...... What if that “just in case” happens!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Speaking of which, Honoka-chan mentioned something important when she fell... Umm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What is it!? Is there some magic to keep me from falling!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I remember now! “Even if you fall, don’t cry!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I’m gonna cryyyy~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
